You can now update your account settings from the app and sign up for push notifications to make sure you never miss your favourite show. We've made some navigation changes too so please explore.
Top tip: Your favourites and your watch list can now be found in discover. Enjoy!

Check out the brand new hayu app and update your reality TV experience!
This release includes new functionality and you can add all of your favourite series to "My Shows" so you'll never miss an episode! We've also added a brand new Categories section, so you can easily discover similar shows to all of your favourites.

We've made improvements and added new features. You can now get personalised messages about your favourite shows, and manage your account details easily on a redesigned account section.

You can now use your Apple ID to sign in and manage your account on hayu. And in this release, we’ve fixed some bugs and made performance improvements so you can keep enjoying your favourite reality TV shows.

We've updated the app making some improvements and fixing bugs.

We update hayu regularly with the latest episodes to make sure you’re up to date with your favorite shows! We’d love to hear any thoughts or suggestions from you –just drop us an email (support@hayu.com) & we’ll get back to you as soon as we can!
